description: The notification sent when a user connection event occurs
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD OG-CONNECT-MIB::ogconnEventOccurred OG-CONNECT-MIB::ogconnEventUsername s EXAMPLE OG-CONNECT-MIB::ogconnEventType s EXAMPLE OG-CONNECT-MIB::ogconnEventPortNumber i 9999 OG-CONNECT-MIB::ogconnEventPortLabel s EXAMPLE

description: The user pertaining to the connection event
variables.name: OG-CONNECT-MIB::ogconnEventUsername

description: Serial port number on which this connection applies
variables.name: OG-CONNECT-MIB::ogconnEventPortNumber

description: The label for the serial port where the connection applies.
variables.name: OG-CONNECT-MIB::ogconnEventPortLabel
